messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine an art office with 21 artists. Amy is working with Bob, Cal, Dan, Eva, Fay, and Gus. Ian is working with Joe, Kim, Leo, Max, Ned, and Ola. Sue is working with Tom, Zac, Kai, Liv, Pam, and Gia. Fay is working with Gus, Bob, Cal, Dan, and Eva. Cal is working with Dan, Eva, Gus, and Bob. Kim is working with Dan, Leo, Max, Ned, and Ola. Ned is working with Ola, Joe, Leo, and Max. Pam is working with Gia, Tom, Zac, Kai, and Liv. Eva is working with Gus, Bob and Zac. Leo is working with Max, Ola, and Joe. Max is connected to Ola and Joe. Liv is working with Gia, Tom, Zac, and Kai. Gus is working with Bob, and Dan. Ola is working with Joe. Gia is working Tom, Zac, and Kai. Bob is working with Dan. Joe is working with Kai. Kai is working with Tom. Tom is working with Zac. Now you have been told that if you  work with Joe, he can get you art supplies worth $100 for free. From Dan what is the path to the person you should work with to get the most reward? Please list the names in order, separated by commas.

The first line contains an integer T, the number of test cases.
The first line of each test case contains an integer N, the number of artists.
The second line contains N space-separated integers A1, A2, ..., AN, the names of the artists.
The third line contains an integer M, the number of artists that can be connected to Joe.
The fourth line contains M space-separated integers J1, J2, ..., JM, the names of the artists that can be connected to Joe.
The fifth line contains an integer Q, the number of questions.
The sixth line contains an integer K, the number of answers.
The seventh line contains an integer R, the regular expression for the answer.

For each test case, print the answer in a single line.
The answer should be printed in the format 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'
where the names should be printed in the order given in the input.

You are not required to print the expected output; it has already been taken care of. Just implement the function.

The first line contains an integer T
